item.blasphemy.seraphim_sword.tooltip:
§7Seraphim is a holy weapon,
§7dealing extra damage to undead creatures,
§7and has a group knockback and damage skill.
item.blasphemy.rapids_sword.tooltip:
§7The Rapids Sword is a weapon known for its speed,
§7it attacks faster than regular swords,
§7and has an execution effect on low health targets.
item.blasphemy.muramasa_sword.tooltip:
§7Muramasa is a weapon known for its damage,
§7it has higher base damage than regular swords,
§7and deals extra damage to high armor targets.
message.blasphemy.seraphim_sword.cooldow: §cSeraphim needs to cool down for %d seconds
message.blasphemy.portal.invalid_block: §cThis block cannot be used to build a Nether portal!
message.blasphemy.portal.invalid_item: §cYou cannot use this item to ignite a Nether portal!
enchantment.blasphemy.cleave.desc:
§7Attacks multiple targets at once,
§7damage increases with level.
